body: Hey #Indiehackers, what are you using for analytics in your web apps & marketing sites? I'm looking at @usefathom and @nocodelytics @sarwechs. #lowcode #nocode #startuptips
Any tips for managing stress, and preventing startup life from infiltrating all elements of personal life? Realized I need to make a change when even the sleeping pill I took didn’t knock me out. 🥲

Three tips for Young African Entrepreneurs  starting a Business 

💥Have a solid Business plan , 
💥Don't be Afraid to ask for Help
💥Dont just get customers ,learn to to retain them. 

From CEO Nengi  #NengiXTEF

Via @Tesy_Gee #startups #business #businessdevelopment

What is a good example of a go-to manual for how to start a startup? From writing a concept note to growth & scaling. 

Ideally, a book that’s less conceptual and more a manual or practical how-to guide, with examples, tools, tips & tricks for getting things done.

Any ideas?

#journorequest After a brief hiatus I'm back & looking for #entrepreneurs #startups who've met & overcome big challenges, not just from covid, but also from Brexit, eg, #exporters who've navigated the current chaos & can share best practice tips. alison@alisoncoleman.co.uk

I am switching from a startup to a giant company . What would you give me the tips to have a good learning growth there . Btw I am still on one month  notice  period @Kilo_Loco @DonnyWals @askari01 @MengTo @nQaze @azamsharp @iosmayank @scottsmithdev

Tips please!💡I'm on the lookout for people who have taken over as CEO for a startup (i.e. non-founder CEOs). Would like to hear ways in which they prepared for their roles, and any advice they'd like to share.
Which startups are on a hiring spree? Who's landed a great new CXO recently? Tips please! 👇

Now and then, I meet a startup that has an offering that makes sense, and on request, I make some Introductions. Remember, these are warm intros. Yet they make some terrible snafus. Here are some tips to move a warm intro forward. A thread 👇👇👇

@gokulr Chief of staff is somehow coming back into vogue though the career planning for this role in a high growth startup tends to be very lightweight.. any tips? Usually you'd put these in category lead / GM roles in larger cos after 2yrs but not that easy in startups.

If procrastination was a sport, I’d be the reigning, defending, undisputed champion of the world. 👊🏻 

My first ever auction draft has just started. 

Help. Me. 

(Best 12-team dynasty startup auction draft tips?? 😅)

@MyFantasyLeague

Startup Tip:- If anyone from Anantnag is interested in starting up a Ridesharing platform like uber in Anantnag. Execute it, do the research, get around 50 drivers and cabs on board, i’m ready to put in upto 10L as angel investor + would connect you to VC’s.
Do I know any Enterprise Sales experts? Looking for someone who would be open to giving some tips / provide feedback to a great startup founder

An #SEO thread for new sites: how to get organic traffic fast. 

This is for freelancers & startups alike.

You don't need 6-12 months to drive organic traffic. That's a myth.

Your main focus should be creating content and earning branded mentions.

Here are some key tips 👇

One thing I struggle with as a founder of a bootstrapped #startup:
Attracting people, especially developers, but not being able to pay them at this point.
Not because I don't want to, I literally can't.
Any tips? Ideally for the Australian market.

Dynasty tip:

In a startup, don’t trade up for a player that will be there when you pick next.

Fear kills startups & dreams. Don't let it!

Stressed is the word that high achievers use for fear

Never be fearful, OK to be stressed sometimes

Tip: Master micro-bravery. conquer fear by breaking it down into smaller steps
Looking for a great diet tip? Join an early stage startup.
Got a tip from a dating app...a guy's profile says his startup plans to go public within the next two years 👀

Pro startup tip: 

Find a cofounder who can cook.

Fundraising tip: Ask founders that recently raised at your round to walk you through their pitch.

Note what they did well. Ex: how did they tell their story? What was compelling about it?

I did this when raising fund, but useful for startups too.
